ComicInfo.Summary:
Ghosts and the Supernatural: Anecdotes of ghost sightings.
The Spirit in the Flying Coffin: Randy Falk kills his stunt-flying partner in the 1930's in France. When Randy returns to the area as a fighter pilot in World War II, Paul's ghost gets his revenge.
The Ferry Boat Phantom: The ghost of a ferry boat captain rescues the passengers of a sunken boat.
The Ghostly Garden: Paul Verrand kills his gardener, Henri, when Henri stumbles on Paul with another man's wife.
